description.ko: 빛의 굴절 물리학을 깊이 있게 탐구한 작품으로, 차가운 수정 구조가 단일 광선을 색과 에너지의 다채로운 폭발로 변환하는 과정을 시각화했습니다.
description.en: A deep dive into the physics of light refraction, where cold crystalline structures transform singular rays into a diverse explosion of color and energy.

prompt: Hyper-realistic macro photography of a geometric glass prism capturing a single beam of pure white light, dispersing it into a vibrant, sharp rainbow spectrum. Soft caustic light patterns dancing on a clean, minimalist obsidian surface. Cinematic lighting, optical physics accuracy, chromatic aberration, 8k resolution, ethereal atmosphere.
